items.sentence: That\'s the most beautiful ship I\'ve ever seen.
I\'m not the kind of person that you think I am.
I\'m sorry to hear that your father passed away.
I\'ve been looking forward to meeting you again.
I have been to the airport to see my father off.
I have been to the airport to see my friend off.
I\'ll never forget the day I fell into the well.
I\'ll see if Tom wants to come over for a visit.
I\'ll speak to Tom about what we just discussed.
When I get through with my work, I\'ll call you.
